policies.with_check: (is_admin() OR ((user_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid)) AND check_user_quota(( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid), 'reward'::text, 'total'::text) AND check_user_quota(( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid), 'reward'::text, 'monthly'::text)))

policies.using: (is_admin() OR (user_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid)) OR ((user_id IS NULL) AND (visible_en_demo = true)))

indexes.name: idx_recompenses_user_created
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_recompenses_user_created ON public.recompenses USING btree (user_id, created_at)

indexes.name: recompenses_one_selected_per_user
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX recompenses_one_selected_per_user ON public.recompenses USING btree (user_id) WHERE ((selected IS TRUE) AND (user_id IS NOT NULL))

indexes.name: recompenses_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX recompenses_pkey ON public.recompenses USING btree (id)

indexes.name: recompenses_points_requis_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX recompenses_points_requis_idx ON public.recompenses USING btree (points_requis)

indexes.name: recompenses_selected_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX recompenses_selected_idx ON public.recompenses USING btree (selected)

indexes.name: recompenses_user_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX recompenses_user_id_idx ON public.recompenses USING btree (user_id)

indexes.name: recompenses_user_selected_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX recompenses_user_selected_idx ON public.recompenses USING btree (user_id, selected)

indexes.name: recompenses_visible_en_demo_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX recompenses_visible_en_demo_idx ON public.recompenses USING btree (visible_en_demo)

constraints.name: recompenses_user_id_fkey
constraints.definition: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

triggers.name: a00_recompenses_set_user_id_before
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER a00_recompenses_set_user_id_before BEFORE INSERT ON recompenses FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION tg_recompenses_set_user_id()

triggers.name: a99_recompenses_set_updated_at
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER a99_recompenses_set_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON recompenses FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION set_updated_at()

triggers.name: recompenses_normalize
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER recompenses_normalize BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE ON recompenses FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION tg_recompenses_normalize()

triggers.name: trg_recompenses_ctr_del
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_recompenses_ctr_del AFTER DELETE ON recompenses FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION recompenses_counter_del()

triggers.name: trg_recompenses_ctr_ins
triggers.definition: CREATE TRIGGER trg_recompenses_ctr_ins AFTER INSERT ON recompenses FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION recompenses_counter_ins()

functions.name: is_admin
functions.definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.is_admin()
 RETURNS boolean
 LANGUAGE sql
 STABLE SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
  select exists (
    select 1 from public.user_roles ur
    join public.roles r on r.id = ur.role_id
    where ur.user_id = auth.uid() and ur.is_active and r.name='admin'
  ) or exists (select 1 from public.profiles p where p.id=auth.uid() and p.is_admin);
$function$

functions.name: set_updated_at
functions.definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.set_updated_at()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SET search_path TO 'pg_catalog', 'public'
AS $function$
begin
  new.updated_at := now();
  return new;
end$function$
